author: USA TODAY, John Bacon, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: UN fears possible 'hunger pandemic'; vaccine official decries dismissal; Trump disagrees with Georgia reopening
description: The U.N. warns of possible 'hunger pandemic,' what a second wave of coronavirus could look like amid flu season, Georgia. Thursday's updates.
content:
Some states are moving slowly towards reopening their economies while others are moving more quickly to reopen.
USA TODAY
